name: @txstate-mws/fastify-shared
description: Types and other code shared between a fastify-txstate API and the UIs it communicates with.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib lib-esm && tsc && tsc -m es2022 --outDir lib-esm --moduleResolution node && node lib/build.js && cp lib/*.d.ts lib-esm/ && cp package-esm.json lib-esm/package.json

author: Nick Wing
